title: Web-based Pharmacy Management System
description: A centralized inventory management system developed for a pharmacy as part of our thesis project.

title: Vehicle Detection System Web Dashboard
description: A web dashboard for a vehicle detection system developed for a commissioned project (No demo)

title: Palindrome Checker
description: A project which checks if a word is a palindrome or not, required by FCC to acquire JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification.

title: Roman Numeral Converter
description: A project which converts Arabic numbers to Roman Numeral required by FCC to acquire JS Algorithms and Data Structures Certification.

title: OcularWear Shop Page
description: A simple product landing page for a made-up eyeglass shop developed for the projects required by FCC to acquire the Responsive Web Design Certification.

title: Dr. Borlaug Tribute Page
description: A tribute page for Dr. Norman Borlaug developed for the projects required by FCC to acquire the Responsive Web Design Certification.
